data.name: DELETE AFTER READING Demo
data.detailed_description:
DELETE AFTER READING. THE SECRET DOOR (DEMO).



In this demo of Delete After Reading a mysterious character will challenge you to prove your sleuthing skills and see if you have what it takes to participate in a secret mission. You will have to explore and find the hidden clues to open a secret door in your room.

It corresponds to a chapter of the Delete After Reading storyline in which a 103 years old ghost girl, a famous blues singer reincarnated as a rabbit, and a dream scriptwriter goblin want you to join them on a secret mission to fix Destiny’s latest injustice: the despised billionaire Martin Skrilhlex has stolen the only existing copy of the highly coveted video game The Curse of Penguin Island so that only he can play it. You’ll have to steal back the video game, so kids around the world can enjoy it. Easy as pie, right? If only Destiny didn’t have the power to know everything you’re doing and planning…

Read a thrilling and fun story not just to discover what happens next, but to find the hints and clues you need to solve the puzzles and riddles to move forward. The story can’t advance with you – the kids need you!



Delete After Reading is a text-based puzzle narrative adventure full of humor, adventure, and mischief. Enjoy a unique mix of literature, puzzles, and escape room mechanics with a ragtag bunch of adorable cartoon characters in the adventure of their afterlives – saving the only copy of one of the most influential games ever made from the machinations of Destiny itself, who doesn’t want anyone meddling with reality!

data.short_description: Cheat Destiny in Delete After Reading, a text-based puzzle narrative adventure: a book you can play with, a game you can read. Help a ragtag bunch of kids and save the only copy of one of the most influential games ever created from the machinations of Destiny itself!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320M / Radeon HD 8760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Intel I3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320M / Radeon HD 8760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 320M graphics processor with 256MB of DDR3 SDRAM shared with main memory
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Intel I3 or superior
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1GB or superior / ATI Radeon HD 1GB or superior
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
